title: Workshop on Designing Sustainable E-Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational e-learning development processes and science education experience
context.additional_context: Learners apply stakeholder-centered design frameworks to acquire practical skills for e-learning content development in science. Operated as a short, intensive, practice-focused course in a blended environment using personal devices.

learning_goals: Explanation of an e-learning program design process reflecting stakeholder requirements, divided into three or more stages
Team-based creation of an e-learning development plan considering cost-effectiveness and operational efficiency
Production of standardized content using learning object repositories and template-based documentation tools

resources: Open content library for science disciplines

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
